content: Ya ever get tickled, and it starts out funny, then you say “OK, enough,” but the tickling continues and then becomes awkward and then uncomfortable and you become angry but nothing you do or say will stop the tickling which has inexplicably escalated to blows to the back of your head with an over-sized, two-handed “Test Your Strength” carnival mallet? I guess what I’m trying to say is you are one brutal carny. But in a good way. This ride really needs a warning: May Hit Too Close to Home.
